DISABLED:
**Slow-mode has just been disabled in {{channel}}!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}slowmode [#channel] (time)` to enable it again!*
ENABLED:
**A slow-mode of `{{time}}` has just been enabled in `{{channel}}`!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}slowmode {{channel}} 0` to disable it!*
PLEASE_WAIT: Channel {{channel}} is in slowmode! Please wait {{time}} between each message!
